The launch of Sputnik in 1957 inaugurated the space age.
Coca-Cola originally contained cocaine.
The biceps muscle in the upper arm is the strongest muscle in the human body.
Milo was originally developed in Australia in 1934. First introduced as a nutritional supplement in Malaysia, it is a hit drink with both young and old.
Elephants walk as quietly as cats.
In Malaysia, orang utan conservation areas include the Semenggoh Wildlife Centre in Sarawak and the Sepilok Orang Utan Sanctuary in Sabah.
The Langkawi Cable Car takes visitors 708m above sea level and is on eof the steepest cable car rides on Earth
Wawasan 2020 is a Malaysian ideal introduced by former Prime Minister Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad. It calls for a self-sufficient industrialised nation by the year 2020.
The "Ring of Fire" - where most volcanoes are located and most earthquakes occur - encircles the Pacific Ocean.
Number 77 in Roman numericals is represented as LXXVII
Lightning never strikes in the same place twice
If an earthworm is cut in half, both halves can regrow their body.
Adults have fewer bones than babies do.
Goldfish only have a memory of three seconds.
Drinking alcohol kills brain cells.
